name: JWSRenewalInfoDecodedPayload
desc: A decoded payload containing subscription renewal information.

items.name: autoRenewProductId
items.desc: The identifier of the product that renews at the next billing period.

items.name: autoRenewStatus
items.desc: The renewal status of the auto-renewable subscription.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The server environment, either sandbox or production.

items.name: gracePeriodExpiresDate
items.desc: The time when the grace period for subscription renewals expires.

items.name: isInBillingRetryPeriod
items.desc: The Boolean value that indicates whether the App Store is attempting to automatically renew an expired subscription.

items.name: offerIdentifier
items.desc: The offer code or promotional offer identifier.

items.name: offerType
items.desc: The type of the subscription offer.

items.name: originalTransactionId
items.desc: The transaction identifier of the original purchase associated with this transaction.

items.name: priceIncreaseStatus
items.desc: The status indicating whether a customer has approved a subscription price increase.

items.name: productId
items.desc: The unique identifier of the product.

items.name: signedDate
items.desc: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that the App Store signed the JSON Web Signature data.
